Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm.dsl

Interface StateBuilder<O,S extends Enum<?>,E extends Enum<E>>

Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - enumeration type for the identifiers of states
E - enumeration type for the identifiers of events
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefinitionBuilder
public interface StateBuilder<O,S extends Enum<?>,E extends Enum<E>>
Domain specific language fluent interface to configure an existing state with new .

    Once a state is selected, you can addToRoot a new transition leaving this state.

  • Method Details

    • add

      default SubStateBuilder<O,S,E> add(S stateId)
      Once a state is selected, you can addToRoot a new substate.
      Parameters:
      stateId - the identifier of the substate to addToRoot
      Returns:
      the substate builder to complete the creation and configuration of a substate

      description - description of the substate
      Returns:
      the substate builder to complete the creation and configuration of a substate

    • on

      ToTransitionBuilder<O,S,E> on(E eventId)
      Once a state is selected, you can addToRoot a new transition leaving this state.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the identifier of the event firing the transition leaving the state
      Returns:
      the transition builder to complete the creation and configuration of a transition
